item.title: Chriss add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You don't have to burn books to destroy a culture. Just get people to stop reading them." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "A deadline is negative inspiration. Still, it's better than no inspiration at all." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Would it save you a lot of time if I just gave up and went mad now?" -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Chriss add a quote by William G.T. Shedd
item.description: "A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for." -- William G.T. Shedd

item.title: Chriss add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "He'd been wrong, there was a light at the end of the tunnel, and it was a flamethrower." -- Terry Pratchett
